about.title: WHAT IS VIRTUADSAI?
about.description1: VirtuAdsAI is the first Web3 decentralized advertising platform that automates digital campaigns on web, metaverses and Play-to-Earn (P2E) video games.
about.description2: We integrate cutting-edge technologies such as XRPL (Ripple) for instant settlement, Chainlink/CCIP for secure oracles, AI Agents for optimization, and Brave/BAT for privacy-first inventory.
